participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Resilient and determined, Emily is someone who faces challenges head-on and values hard work.
participant_1.background: i love playing softball. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and dedicated, Jessica is highly motivated to achieve her goals both academically and personally.
participant_2.background: my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i'm currently in high school. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year.
